author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Malaysia Airlines offers customers irresistible travel dealsTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Malaysia Airlines offers customers irresistible travel deals
In conjunction with the Malaysia International Travel Mart (MITM), beginning Aug 1 4until Aug 17, Malaysia Airlines (MAS) is offering customers irresistible travel deals.
In a statement yesterday, MAS said travellers could enjoy great bargains on its domestic and international routes for immediate travel until Mar 31, 2016.
The deals could be viewed via website www.malaysiaairlines.com, it said.
The national carrier would also be joining 60 exhibitors in the MITM, held at the Mid Valley Exhibition Centre.
MAS Senior Manager, Regional Sales Malaysia, Kathleen Leong, said travellers should take advantage of this special promotion and plan travels ahead with families and loved ones.
“This is the time for travellers to go out and explore the hidden gems of our homeground or travel abroad for a much needed vacation.
“If you are in the city, come and visit our booth at the MITM and you will be spoilt for choice on our many exclusive travel deals,” she said.
She said MAS would also be giving away return tickets to Tokyo, Hong Kong and Bangkok to lucky draw winners during the exhibition.
